r.s: DataStax PHP Driver for Apache Cassandra
r.d: A modern, feature-rich and highly tunable PHP client library for Apache Cassandra and DataStax Enterprise using exclusively Cassandra's binary protocol and Cassandra Query Language v3.
r.n:
# 1.2.2
Bug Fixes:
* [PHP-88] \Cassandra\Timestamp::toDateTime segfault with PHP7 * [PHP-112] Freeing a null future as result of a failure in \Cassandra\DefaultSession::executeAsync() * [PHP-115] \Cassandra\UUID returning duplicate UUIDs
